meanings.definition: In a manner that is in agreement or harmony with others
meanings.sent1: The group of friends danced consentaneously to the music at the party.
meanings.sent2: The team worked consentaneously to complete the project on time.

meanings.sent4: The colors of the painting blended consentaneously, creating a beautiful masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The children's laughter filled the room consentaneously, bringing joy to all.
